books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: As the government hit man Will Robie and his partner, Jessica Reel, prepare for a mission, they face a new adversary.
books.name: THE TARGET

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A freelance writer who may have witnessed a murder-suicide joins the dead man’s brother to learn what happened.
books.name: THE COLLECTOR

books.author: by Maeve Binchy
books.description: Binchy, who died in 2012, depicts ordinary lives in Dublin.
books.name: CHESTNUT STREET

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Amanda Quick
books.description: Amity Doncaster joins forces with Benedict Stanbridge, a spy for the Crown, to defeat a serial killer known as the Bridegroom; by Jayne Ann Krentz, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: OTHERWISE ENGAGED

books.author: by Laurelin Paige
books.description: Collects "Fixed on You," "Found in You" and "Forever With You," the story of Alayna Wither and Hudson Pierce.
books.name: THE FIXED TRILOGY

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: Zach Jordan and his partner are called when the body of a wealthy woman is discovered in Central Park.
books.name: NYPD RED 2

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark
books.description: The producer of a true-crime show must contend with participants with secrets as well as her husband’s murderer.
books.name: I'VE GOT YOU UNDER MY SKIN

books.author: by Delilah Devlin, Sharon Hamilton and others
books.description: A bundle of 10 military romance novels and novellas, revolving around Navy SEALs.
books.name: SEALS OF SUMMER

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Kimberly McCreight
books.description: A teenager falls to her death from the roof of her Brooklyn private school. It’s ruled a suicide, but her mother suspects otherwise.
books.name: RECONSTRUCTING AMELIA

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Kat Donovan, an N.Y.P.D. detective, searches for the ex-fiancé who left her years before, and for her father’s murderer.
books.name: MISSING YOU

books.author: by Brian McGilloway
books.description: A Northern Ireland police officer finds a little girl in the woods, her hands covered in blood.
books.name: LITTLE GIRL LOST
